headline: Align Technology Supports Landmark Swiss Epidemiological Study Led by University of Bern
summary: TEMPE, Ariz., February 02, 2026--Align is providing its iTero™ Lumina intraoral scanner, which will have a central role in the study’s oral health data collection.

headline: Align Technology: Market Share Loss Inevitable, But Will Remain The Market Leader
summary: Sequoia Fund discusses its new position in Align Technology and long-term outlook. Read the full Q4 2025 shareholder letter for complete portfolio insights.
